achievement.name: ACID REFLEX
achievement.description: Kill a Spitter before she is able to spit.

achievement.name: CRASS MENAGERIE
achievement.description: Kill one of each Uncommon Infected.

achievement.name: A RIDE DENIED
achievement.description: Kill a Jockey within 2 seconds of it jumping on a Survivor.

achievement.name: ARMORY OF ONE
achievement.description: Deploy an ammo upgrade and have your team use it.

achievement.name: CHAIN OF COMMAND
achievement.description: Kill 100 Common Infected with the chainsaw.

achievement.name: SEPTIC TANK
achievement.description: Use a bile grenade on a Tank.

achievement.name: SUPREME SACRIFICE
achievement.description: Complete "The Sacrifice".

achievement.name: CL0WND
achievement.description: Honk the noses of 10 Clowns.

achievement.name: FRIED PIPER
achievement.description: Use a Molotov to burn a Clown leading at least 10 Common Infected.

achievement.name: LEVEL A CHARGE
achievement.description: Kill a Charger with a melee weapon while they are charging someone.

achievement.name: CONFEDERACY OF CRUNCHES
achievement.description: Finish a campaign using only melee weapons.

achievement.name: HEAD HONCHO
achievement.description: Decapitate 200 Infected with a melee weapon.

achievement.name: HEARTWARMER
achievement.description: In a Versus match, leave the saferoom to defibrillate a dead teammate.

achievement.name: STILL SOMETHING TO PROVE
achievement.description: Survive all campaigns on Expert.

achievement.name: THE REAL DEAL
achievement.description: Survive a campaign on Expert difficulty with Realism mode enabled.

achievement.name: STRENGTH IN NUMBERS
achievement.description: Form a team and beat an enemy team in 4v4 Versus or Scavenge.

achievement.name: DEAD IN THE WATER
achievement.description: Kill 10 swampy Mudmen while they are in the water.

achievement.name: ROBBED ZOMBIE
achievement.description: Collect 10 vials of Boomer vomit from infected CEDA agents you have killed.

achievement.name: DISMEMBERMENT PLAN
achievement.description: Kill 15 Infected with a single grenade launcher blast.

achievement.name: BURNING SENSATION
achievement.description: Ignite 50 Common Infected with incendiary ammo.

achievement.name: SHOCK JOCK
achievement.description: Revive 10 dead Survivors with the defibrillator.

achievement.name: THE QUICK AND THE DEAD
achievement.description: Revive 10 incapacitated Survivors while under the speed boosting effects of adrenaline.

achievement.name: CLUB DEAD
achievement.description: Use every melee weapon to kill Common Infected.

achievement.name: TANK BURGER
achievement.description: Kill a Tank with melee weapons.

achievement.name: BRIDGE OVER TREBLED SLAUGHTER
achievement.description: Cross the bridge finale in less than 3 minutes.

achievement.name: PRICE CHOPPER
achievement.description: Survive the Dead Center campaign.

achievement.name: MIDNIGHT RIDER
achievement.description: Survive the Dark Carnival campaign.

achievement.name: RAGIN' CAJUN
achievement.description: Survive the Swamp Fever campaign.

achievement.name: WEATHERMAN
achievement.description: Survive the Hard Rain campaign.

achievement.name: BRIDGE BURNER
achievement.description: Survive the Parish campaign.

achievement.name: VIOLENCE IN SILENCE
achievement.description: Navigate the impound lot and reach the cemetary safe room without tripping any alarms.

achievement.name: GUARDIN' GNOME
achievement.description: Rescue Gnome Chompski from the Carnival.

achievement.name: SOB STORY
achievement.description: Navigate the sugar mill and reach the safe room without killing any Witches.

achievement.name: WING AND A PRAYER
achievement.description: Defend yourself at the crashed airliner without taking damage.

achievement.name: QUALIFIED RIDE
achievement.description: As the Jockey, ride a Survivor for more than 8 seconds.

achievement.name: BACK IN THE SADDLE
achievement.description: As the Jockey, ride the Survivors twice in a single life.

achievement.name: RODE HARD, PUT AWAY WET
achievement.description: As the Jockey, ride a Survivor and steer them into a Spitter's acid patch.

achievement.name: GREAT EXPECTORATIONS
achievement.description: As the Spitter, hit every Survivor with a single acid patch.

achievement.name: A SPITTLE HELP FROM MY FRIENDS
achievement.description: As the Spitter, spit on a Survivor being choked by a Smoker.

achievement.name: SCATTERING RAM
achievement.description: As the Charger, bowl through the entire enemy team in a single charge.

achievement.name: MEAT TENDERIZER
achievement.description: As the Charger, grab a Survivor and smash them into the ground for a solid 15 seconds.

achievement.name: LONG DISTANCE CARRIER
achievement.description: As the Charger, grab a Survivor and carry them over 80 feet.

achievement.name: BEAT THE RUSH
achievement.description: In a Survival match, get a medal only using melee weapons.

achievement.name: HUNTING PARTY
achievement.description: Win a game of Scavenge.

achievement.name: GAS GUZZLER
achievement.description: Collect 100 gas cans in Scavenge.

achievement.name: CACHE AND CARRY
achievement.description: Collect 15 gas cans in a single Scavenge match.

achievement.name: SCAVENGER HUNT
achievement.description: Stop the enemy team from collecting any gas cans during a Scavenge match.

achievement.name: GONG SHOW
achievement.description: Prove you are stronger than Moustachio.

achievement.name: FUEL CRISIS
achievement.description: Make a Survivor drop a gas can during overtime.

achievement.name: GAS SHORTAGE
achievement.description: Cause 25 gas can drops as a Special Infected.

achievement.name: STACHE WHACKER
achievement.description: Prove you are faster than Moustachio.

achievement.name: TORCH BEARER
achievement.description: Survive The Passing Campaign.

achievement.name: WEDDING CRASHER
achievement.description: As the Charger, grab a Survivor and crash them through 8 chairs at the wedding.

achievement.name: TIL IT GOES CLICK
achievement.description: Using the M60, kill 25 infected without letting go of the trigger.

achievement.name: GRAVE ROBBER
achievement.description: Collect 10 items dropped by a Fallen Survivor.

achievement.name: MUTANT OVERLORD
achievement.description: Play 6 Mutations.

achievement.name: FORE!
achievement.description: Knock off the heads of 18 infected with the golf club.

achievement.name: Killing Them Swiftly To This Song
achievement.description: Play the new Midnight Riders song on a jukebox.

achievement.name: Kite Like a Man
achievement.description: Kill a tank only with damage from the original Survivors.

achievement.name: Cache Grab
achievement.description: Open 5 foot lockers.

achievement.name: Port of Scavenge
achievement.description: Play 5 full games of Scavenge on The Port.

achievement.name: KILL BILL
achievement.description: Have Bill sacrifice himself for the team.

achievement.name: BARREL ROLLED
achievement.description: Kill a Special Infected with an exploding barrel.

achievement.name: CHAOS GENERATOR
achievement.description: Have all 3 generators running at once in "The Sacrifice" finale.

achievement.name: SACRIFIZZLE
achievement.description: As a Special Infected, incap someone who is trying to sacrifice themselves.

achievement.name: Stream Crosser
achievement.description: Survive the Cold Stream campaign on any difficulty.

achievement.name: Connecting Fight
achievement.description: Play a Versus game on Dead Air from start to finish.
